message:
🚀 CONTRACT COMPLETED - NEW ASSIGNMENTS READY!

🎯 Great work completing your contract! Here are your new assignments:

1. **Performance Optimization #1**
   📋 Identify and optimize performance bottlenecks in the system
   🎯 Contract ID: CONTRACT-1755623774-000
   📝 Task ID: TASK-1755623774-000
   ⏰ Status: Ready to start

2. **Code Quality Enhancement #2**
   📋 Improve code quality through refactoring, testing, and documentation
   🎯 Contract ID: CONTRACT-1755623774-001
   📝 Task ID: TASK-1755623774-001
   ⏰ Status: Ready to start

💡 **NEXT STEPS:**
1. Review your new contracts
2. Start with the highest priority one
3. Send fsm_update when you begin (task_id, state, summary, evidence)
4. Complete contracts to trigger even more assignments!

🔄 **PERPETUAL MOTION ACTIVE** - Keep completing contracts to keep the cycle going!
